articles.author: Anirudh Singh
articles.title: Australia veteran Shane Watson points out the mistake Rohit Sharma made in ODI World Cup 2023 final - Cricket Times
articles.description: Shane Watson has pointed out the mistake made by India captain Rohit Sharma in the ODI World Cup 2023 final. India lost to Australia by 6 wickets in the summit clash.
articles.content: In a heart-wrenching loss, millions of Indian cricket fans saw their team fall to Australia in the ODI World Cup 2023 final on Sunday. Australia clinched their sixth title with a six-wicket victory a… [+2086 chars]

articles.title: Chahal's cryptic no-word reaction after India snub for Australia T20I series - Hindustan Times
articles.description: BCCI announced a 15-member squad for theT20I series which begins from November 23 which will comprise of only three members from India's ODI World Cup squad. | Cricket
